Anyone else play it yet and have an issue on that scene? I don't think it's due to my PC because it breaks up in the same place played on my PC (VLC), and also from my Tivo.

Download VLC 1.1.0 for Windows 7. As far as HD capabilities are concerned, VLC 1.1.0 now features "GPU decoding on Windows Vista and 7, Improved support for MKV HD, including seeking fixes, and 7.1 channels codecs. [And] support for new codecs, like Blu-Ray subtitles, MPEG-4 lossless and VP8,? VideoLAN stated.
